description: You awaken in a cold stone chamber lit by a flickering torch. The air is damp and silent. Passages lead east and north.
You enter a storage rooms with dusty shelves. A faint glow catches your eye, an amulet lies abandoned here. Exits are to the west and north.
You enter a narrow corridor. The walls are covered with eerie portraits. Paths lead east, south, and north.
You step into a circular chamber. A heavy treasure chest rests in the center, sealed with an old iron lock. Exits are west and south.
As you enter the room you see a cursed, hollow armor. Behind it, on a pedestal, rests an iron key. The only way out is to the south.
